comments:
Using 1.0 release.

I exported preferences from a workspace.  Then created a new workspace
and imported the preferences.  Received this error.  I will attach the preferences.

--

Created an attachment (id=55680)
Preference file

This is the preference file I imported.
Just fyi, I could not submit this bug via Mylar until I made the Version "unspecified".  When I entered 1.0 it was getting an error from the server about the version being invalid.

Fixed for 1.0.1, due out Dec 22nd.  There should not be any bad behavior from this, other than notification management (i.e. the popup) not starting.  To fix that you can toggle the corresponding preference in Preference -> Mylar -> Task List.
